body.p: I am very happy to have the pleasance of accepting your picturesque remembrances of Warsaw. The two papers will go best (I think) rolled into one.Published as ‘When Order Reigned in Warsaw’, All the Year Round 10 (5 September 1863): 31-5. You shall have a proof sent to you in that form, a few days hence.
